review: Works great! Like the voice command search!
author: Anthony H Goodwin

review: Piece of garbage, start a movie lose a movie what a joke. I have top of the line comcast wireless router 10 ft away loses connection all the time. Save the frustration and look for a different product
author: ron dalpra

review: Like it! SlingTV for $20 a month is a great value. Not sure since I dumped my Comcast Cable but I think they are throttling the streaming... That is annoying. Paying the jerks $66.95 a month. With an HDTV antenna, and Pluto TV getting plenty of Channels! Also using Oooma which gives me free landline over internet. So I am paying $86.95 for internet, TV and phone!
author: Joseph A. Davis

review: Great device. Would be better if it had volume control and came with an hdmi cable.
author: Steven M. Medeiros

review: a serious upgrade to my entertainment system. I particularly like the voice activation feature.
author: Bensaplayin

review: Easy to setup, user friendly and love all the options offered.
author: Billie Lucas

review: Haven't had my Fire TV very long so hard to give it 5 stars yet. Was easy to install. Have only watched 3 movies, easy to do. I'm sure I will give it 5 stars as I get more use from it
author: Beverly C. Escobedo "TexBev"

review: Oh my goodness! I love this thing. I don't know why anyone would consider paying for cable. With all the shows available on Prime and Hulu, we never watch television. Pandora and iHeart Radio, out home is always filled with music. The screensaver plays photos from our Amazon Cloud and acts like a giant picture frame when it is mot in active use. The little games are very fun. The game controller is on my Christmas list. Highly recommend.
author: Amazon Customer

review: our first step to getting off the cable at the end of our contract in 2 months
author: robert mcarthur
